summary:
Compassionate technical leader and critical thinker with a proven track record of effective design and development of quality software and full life cycle of product delivery.

Specialties: AWS, Distributed Systems, Root Cause Analysis, Operational Excellence, Observability, Technical Leadership, Hiring and Mentoring.

Interests: Architecting and implementing highly available, scalable and reliable systems from concept to reality in operationally and cost sensitive way with a focus to serve customers and minimize toil using knowledge of Microservices, Serverless, CQRS, Event Sourcing, Streaming and Change Data Capture (CDC) architectural patterns.
headline: Principal Software Development Engineer at Zillow Group

educations.degree: Bachelor of Technology (Honors in Image Processing)
educations.description: As part of ashakiran volunteering (https://ashakiran.com/), I provided tutoring on all school subjects to small children in the area who could not afford schooling.
educations.activities: Computer Science Engineering; Honors in Digital Image Processing; Research Assistant for Digital Image Processing Virtual Lab; Volunteer member of ashakiran in Hyderabad

position.title: Software Development Engineer, AWS Elastic Load Balancing

multiLocaleTitle.en_US: Software Development Engineer, AWS Elastic Load Balancing

position.description:
• ELB Data Plane Platform team, which manages Data Plane for 2 types
of Load Balancers:
- Application Load Balancer: Operates at request level (Layer-7) (https://aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/application-load-balancer/).
- Classic: Operates at both request level (Layer-7) and connection level (Layer-4) (https://aws.amazon.com/elasticloadbalancing/classic-load-balancer/).
• These 2 load balancers host some of the most popular domains on internet for more than 100k+ customers in 25+ AWS regions and operate one of the biggest Data Plane fleet on AWS.
• Some of the noteworthy projects that I led / contributed-to in this team: Access Logs delivery from from load balancer nodes to S3, load balancer Health Checks, billing and CloudWatch metrics.
• Helped launch several new regions for ELB and led cross-org automation efforts to reduce new region build effort.

position.title: Software Development Engineer, AWS WorkSpaces
position.description:
• AWS WorkSpaces (https://aws.amazon.com/workspaces/) provides a fully managed, secure and reliable Virtual Desktop on AWS
Cloud. It is used by 10k+ enterprises to provide virtual desktops for varied worker types,
especially hybrid and remote workers.
• Worked on projects on both Control Plane and Data Plane. Also led several successful
initiatives to improve operational stability and provided oversight on improving
deployment processes by building metrics pipelines and operational dashboards
• Some of the projects that I worked on in this team include: WorkSpaces Health
Checks, CloudWatch Metrics (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/cloudwatch-metrics.html) and Tagging (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workspaces/latest/adminguide/tag-workspaces-resources.html).

position.title: Software Development Engineer, Amazon Affiliates
position.description:
• Designed and developed several high scale low latency systems to enable content
creators, publishers and bloggers monetize their website traffic by featuring Amazon
products on their sites and social media.
• Amazon affiliate program (https://affiliate-program.amazon.com/) is one of the largest programs in the world with over 1MM
affiliates. These affiliates drive 10s of billions of dollars in sales for Amazon world-wide.
• Worked on different parts of Amazon’s affiliate infrastructure - Link/Ad-building, Link/Adserving,
Payments and Telemetry.
• Architected and implemented “Amazon Publisher Studio” - A new Ad-Building Tool to
allow website owners to create In-image ads on their websites. It was used by more than 25k affiliates in the first year of its launch and brought in millions of dollars in sales. Also worked with my team to file this product as a patent (https://patents.google.com/patent/US20140129959).

position.title: Software Development Engineer, Yahoo
position.description:
Worked at Yahoo Advertising Platform Group on a Greenfield product which allows
advertisers to manage Display Ads across multiple advertising channels. Implemented
APIs and front-end using Java, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

position.title: Research Assistant
position.description:
* Worked as a Research Assistant for professor Jayanthi Sivaswamy (Professor & Dean at IIIT) to help build Virtual Labs for Digital Image processing.
* Implemented a diverse set of digital image processing experiments for the Virtual Lab (https://cse19-iiith.vlabs.ac.in/).

position.title: Software Development Intern
position.description:
Built kernel extension for IMB’s AIX operating systems to enable memory sharing
between different Workload Partitions (WPARs) by adding interfaces for SHM system commands
to allow memory sharing across WPARs.

honors.title: People's Choice Award at Amazon India Social Hackday 2012
honors.description: As part of an internal Social Hack day 2012 at Amazon India, I was working with 1 other developer and 1 PM to build a Browser Bookmarklet, which can be used to create Amazon Affiliate Text Links on various blogging platforms like - WordPress and Blogger. It could also be used to share affiliate links on social media platforms like Facebook and Twitter. This hack won People's choice award.

multiLocaleHeadline.en: Principal Software Development Engineer at Zillow Group
